scripts.id:both: npm run id:anchor && npm run id:lib
scripts.idl:init: anchor idl init  -f target/idl/*.json `solana address -k target/deploy/*-keypair.json`
scripts.idl:upgrade: anchor idl upgrade  -f target/idl/*.json `solana address -k target/deploy/*-keypair.json`
scripts.project:init: rm -fr target && anchor build && anchor deploy && npm run id:both && anchor build && anchor deploy && npm run idl:init && cd ../app && npm run generate-data-account
scripts.project:upgrade: anchor build && anchor deploy && npm run idl:upgrade
